content: lion brand pattern # 70527ad skill level easy size 0-6 months 12-18 months 2-3 years 4 years finished chest 19 20 22 25 in 48 5 51 56 63 5 cm finished length 9 1/2 10 11 12 1/2 in 24 25 5 28 32 cm 920-159 babysoft yarn lemon drop 1-2 balls one button 3/4 in 20 mm diameter pieces left front right front back sleeves 2 worked in single and double_crochet u s right front is narrower than the left front piece finishing sew pieces together fold about 3/4 in 2 cm to right side at end of sleeves for cuffs sew in place crochet edging sew on button use spaces between stitches as buttonhole construction schematics are provided *ed note pattern can be adapted for boys or girls reverse button placement *
